message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. That's the lowest I can go.
